notes: Includes reports of numerous putative subspecies; currently the BC CDC does not even recognize Sorex monticola; "there has been disagreement over whether Sorex monticola is distinct from S. vagrans at the species level; most recent studies recognize S. monticola as a distinct species (e.g., Jones et al.1992; Hutterer in Wilson and Reeder 1993, 2005; Smith and Belk 1996).‚Äù (IUCN)
Tentatively includes Sorex vagrans vagrans and Sorex vagrans isolatus (Vancouver Island vagrant shrew), though some sources do not recognize the latter subspecies
